title: A Conversation with Alan Rickman (Part 1)
description: In Part 1, Neil deGrasse Tyson chats with Alan Rickman about the craft of acting, the problems with the education system, and how he chooses and prepares for roles.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: In Part 1, Neil deGrasse Tyson chats with Alan Rickman about the craft of acting, the problems with the education system, and how he chooses and prepares for roles.
